introduction: The Tata Trusts Professional Enhancement Grant is a prestigious scholarship designed to support meritorious Indian students pursuing postgraduate engineering studies.

basic_requirements: Applicant must be an Indian citizen
Age must be under 45 years as of June 30, 2025
Must be enrolled in a Postgraduate Engineering program

scholarship_benefits.description: Scholarship amount is decided based on the norms set by Tata Trusts and the candidate's financial need.

steps: Visit the Tata Trusts official website
